      • increaseAdPercentageTo

        public java.lang.String increaseAdPercentageTo(java.lang.String nickname,
                                               java.lang.String audioID)
        Increases the count for reproducing an Ad of an user.
        Parameters:
        nickname - nickname of the user to increase the Ad count
        audioID - ID of the reproduced audio, to know how much it must be added to the Ad count.
        Returns:
        An Ad in case the user already reaches the limit. A null value otherwise.

      • getMostPlayedByClassification

        Parameters:
        type - The type of classification to search for (Genre, Category....)
        Returns:
        A string with each classification enum value, and its total reproductions count

      • getMostPlayedClassificationOf

        Parameters:
        nickname - The user to look for
        Returns:
        A string with each classification enum value, and its total reproductions count

      • getTopSellingSong

        public java.lang.String getTopSellingSong()

        Returns:
        Top selling song
